getMobileRecentSales

Overview

This call is used to fetch properties that are recently sold on the given suburb using BSGv2’s Search method.

When the showAdditionalDataElements is true, it will use the BSGv3’s property service to show the additional fields that aren’t available on BSGv2.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes Yes

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Method_search

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
suburb Suburb Yes
state State Yes
postcode Postcode Yes
maxResult Maximum Result No
type Property Type No
showAdditionalDataElements Show Additional Data Elements No

Sample Request { "op": "getMobileRecentSales", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "suburb": "Newtown", "state": "NSW", "postcode": "2042", "type": "house" }
